title: channing bete font
content:
does anyone know the font used by Channing Bete on all of there booklets. It is the bold header font similar to comic sans

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [PM 45 B.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317181329/http:/typophile.com/files/PM%2045%20B.png) | 20.08 KB |
author: jwsavage44

comments.content:
This font identification question is being dealt with in [http://typophile.com/node/122014](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317181329/http:/typophile.com/node/122014 "http://typophile.com/node/122014")  
All font ID requests should go to [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317181329/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")  
don
